name: GETTING UPGRADED
description:
A 2-D platformer with dangerous obstacles.  Get passed the deadly spikes and saws or die trying.

Key Features

  • Relaxed game play for the casual gamer, and hidden more challenging levels for people who like to try and find them.
  • With 7 levels to get through, with 3 different designs (Summer,  Winter,  and Autumn,).
  • Custom music

Controls

  • WASD or Arrow keys to move around the map
  • Space to jump
  • "ESC" to pause and to return to menu
